wikipedia_page.main: Ian Williams (born 26 October 1967),Great Britain Sabre Lead Talent Coach was the National Sabre Coach for Team GB Fencing (2006–2008), and is the head coach at Camden Fencing Club in London. He was previously an international fencer and competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics.Williams was coached by Christian Bauer and Péter Fröhlich for a number of years, and together with James Williams they run a successful summer training camp in the UK. He is left-handed. Ian Now coaches Fencing at Whitgift school In south croydon.
